short_summary: Advance Contract Award Notice to establish an agreement with the Provider of Services to provide microbiology laboratory reference services with respect to parasitology for the National Microbiology Laboratory (NML).
description: The National Microbiology Laboratory (NML) has a requirement to establish an agreement with the Provider of Services to provide microbiology laboratory reference services with respect to parasitology.

#### Contract Title

* **French**: PAC 6D055-225262 Services de référence en parasitologie

#### Procurement Details

#### Rationale
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) has a pressing requirement for offering microbiology laboratory reference services with respect to a unique skill set.
